name: Groovy (itch)
description:
A mashup inspired by cult classics Evil Dead and Mother 3. This was created for the Mashup Jam.  This is the first game I have made and the first time in game jam.

Music was done by Gene Logan

Art and programming was done by Nicolas Pearson

I hope everyone enjoys

Controls:

SPACE to interact

ARROW KEYS to move

KEYBOARD for various inputs
